body.name: GOTHAM STEEL 8 Inch Non Stick Frying Pan, Ultra Durable Induction Pan, Frying Pan Nonstick with Ceramic Coating, Egg Pan for Cooking, Ceramic Pan, Stay Cool Handle, Dishwasher Safe, 100% Toxin Free

features: ULTIMATE CERAMIC NONSTICK – The Gotham Steel nonstick cooking surface is coated three times and then reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No seasoning or even oil or butter needed, makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup.

HEALTHY & NONTOXIC & DURABLE – Gotham Steel cookware are free of PFOA, PFOS & other harmful chemicals including lead & cadmium for an eco-friendly, healthy experience. The coating of the pan is durable enough to withstand metal spatulas spoons whisks and more while the aluminum exterior is dense nonporous and highly wear-resistant for long lasting performance

EVEN HEAT DISTRIBUTION & EFFORTLESS CLEANUP – the composition of this frying pan and the unique spiralized bottom design ensures even heat distribution all around with no dead zones or hot spots. After all the cooking and prepping is done place cookware in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup

OVEN SAFE & ERGONOMIC STAY COOL HANDLES – This set is compatible with all cooktops including gas electric besides induction and is oven safe up to 500°F. The soft grip handles are ergonomically designed for both righty and lefties & the unique shaped handles lets heat escape and keeps the handles cool to the touch.

GOTHAM STEEL COOKWARE - with over 30 million happy customers, Gotham Steel has revolutionized kitchens across the world with the introduction of the nonstick ceramic copper cookware! New for 2021, our award-winning frying pans have improved in every area including the nonstick coating, stay cool handles, exterior finish and durability, including infusing diamond-like particles to the surface to ensure the pan doesn’t scratch! We’re excited to welcome you & yours to the Gotham Steel family.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Ultra Nonstick. Coated three times with our mineral coating for the ultimate nonstick experience – without oil and butter. Food glides around on the pan and nothing sticks, even after years of use. 100% PFOA Free. The healthy mineral nonstick coating is free of PFAS, PFOA, lead, and cadmium, so it will never release toxic fumes, even if it’s accidentally overheated. Metal Utensil Safe. the coating of the pan is infused with diamonds, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick use Dishwasher Safe. Easy cleanup. Simply wipe down and throw in the dishwasher for the super quick experience.

GOTHAM STEEL NONSTICK CERAMIC COOKWARE COLLECTION ULTIMATE CERAMIC NONSTICK – the Gotham Steel nonstick cooking surface is coated three times and then reinforced with diamonds to deliver the ultimate food release. No seasoning or even oil or butter needed, makes for healthier eating, and provides for hassle free, 1-2-3 cleanup.HEALTHY & NON-TOXIC – the Gotham Steel coating is composed of ceramic and reinforced with titanium, ensuring this frying pan free of PFOA, PFOS, lead & cadmium for an friendly, healthy experience for your entire familyMETAL UTENSIL SAFE – the coating of the pan is infused with diamonds, the strongest material on earth which makes it durable enough to withstand metal utensils, spatulas, spoons, whisks and even electric beaters while delivering years of outstanding, nonstick useEFFORTLESS CLEANUP, DISHWASHER SAFE– spend less time with cleanup! After all the cooking and prepping is done, place cookware in the dishwasher for quick and easy cleanup.STOVETOP & OVEN SAFE - compatible with gas, electric, glass cooktops & oven safe up to a sizzling up to 500° Fahrenheit, lids included!STAY COOL HANDLES – the stainless-steel handles are ergonomically designed for both righty and lefties & the unique Y shaped handles let’s heat escape and keeps the handles cool to the touchSOLID ALUMINUM COMPOSITION – stamped from a single sheet of aluminum in a heavy press ensures even heat conductivity and distribution all around with no dead zones or hot spots

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Product is great. Easy to clean. Nothing sticks at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this pan
reviews.reviewText: It is lightweight and food slides right out. Made well and clean up is a breeze. Wish I had the whole set.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to fry eggs, pancakes, patties.
reviews.reviewText: It hasn't stuck yet and I've used it for frying a few months. It's small, just like I like it for my purposes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great non-stick performance
reviews.reviewText: I have other cookware in this series and I found that when cleaned carefully (hand wash only with gentle sponges) the non-stick qualities last a very long time, so far more than a year with daily use and still going strong.This pan has fairly good heat distribution despite being relatively lightweight. I use it for bacon and it cleans right up with just a few wipes of a paper towel. The bottom of the pan is slightly domed so liquid tends to run from the center.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: After many uses, cracked 2 eggs with no oil in pan and after cooking a while, eggs did not stick! Love this! I also have a 12inch, and 1 or 2qt pot!All great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not for induction
reviews.reviewText: Doesn’t work on my Duxtop burner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good pan
reviews.reviewText: I like the size for a 2 egg omelet and individual breakfast for myself and others. Non stick works on lower temperatures.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars only lasted 11 months
reviews.reviewText: I don't know how long a fry pan should last, but after 11 months, the non stick capacity is gone. have to put a lot of butter to make my eggs not stick
